text: Falling Overnight NR CC .On the night before Elliot Carson has risky surgery that could end his life , falling in love is the last thing on his mind .But that 's before he meets Chloe Webb , a young photographer who invites him to her art show .Elliot welcomes the distraction and as the night descends , Chloe takes him on an intimate and exhilarating journey through the city .Top Customer Reviews .By far , one of most intimate movies I 've ever seen .I laughed , I smiled , I sympathized .

The adventures they embarked on , the people they interacted with , the intimate moments ... all felt genuine .People often ask , " Who is your ideal girl from a movie ? " Chloe is it .Someone who is adventurous , sympathetic , free - spirited , artistic , beautiful , caring , etc . .After finishing the movie at one in the morning , I skated around just to release the tension the film had me in .Finally a story that captured that natural innocent love .Comment 6 of 6 people found this helpful .

From the two main characters chemistry , to the sharing of the good , the bad , the awkward and the completely random .It feels like I 'm hanging out with my own quirky friends , going on a first date with someone I 'm wholly enamored with , sharing real life with real people .Nothing about this script feels ... scripted .It just feels real .I like Hollywood movies but this was definitely a nice refreshing change from your standard box office prescription for success , without trying too hard to be different .

It 's not cliché ( of the happy or sad variety ) .It 's just like life , one day at a time .P.S.
